catalog.name: Brazilian Air Force Rawinsondes and Pibals, January 1950-November 1986

dataset.name: Brazilian Air Force Rawinsondes and Pibals, January 1950-November 1986

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - Brazilian Air Force Rawinsondes and Pibals, January 1950-November 1986(d394001)

metadata.documentation: NCDC has provided rawinsonde data for eleven Brazilian stations and pibal data for thirty stations for the general period January 1950 to November 1986. The actual period, however, varies widely by individual station. The data were recorded by the Brazilian Air Force.
